column5: Cozy bedroom with access to living room and kitchen in a quiet neighborhood in Houstonâ€™s Museum District. 2 miles from both Downtown/GRB/Toyota Center/Minute Maid Ballpark and the Medical Center/Rice and less than half a mile from the light rail / bus station.
